column4: Firefox just updated and now the menus are missing.  ff is not in full screen mode (F11) I tried that...  Any ideas how to retrieve?
Right-click on the toolbar and check "Navigation Toolbar"
I do not have a toolbar.  I only have the window title bar and the body of the web page, no nav or links etc...
Have you tried logging out of all sessions (or rebooting) yet?
I closed all sessions and restarted, but not reboot
There's a more drastic approach, which is deleting your settings manually
Do you want to do that?
You can move your settings temporarily and then put them back too.
so now I have to reinstall all of my add-ons ?
That's why I said it was an extreme solution...
There's probably one specific file in the profile that you could delete to reset the GUI, but I don't know which one that is.
Did you know there was a safe-mode? "firefox -safe-mode" works sometimes
Tried resetting toolbars etc... If I continue in safe mode, all is good (minus the add-ons) but if I try to make changes and restart, I get same problem... :(
well, easier I guess to start fresh... I use xmarks anyway so not much trouble...
